content: loopy handmade loopy soap sack crochet pattern design by gillian docherty © loopy handmade 2021 www loopyhandmade com 1/7 loopy handmade description the loopy soap sack is an easy crochet pattern and works up fast simply slip a bar of soap into the pouch and use it as a washcloth the soft dense texture of this soap sack will gently cleanse and exfoliate your skin and you can hang it up to dry in between washes pattern includes two options for finishing the opening edge skill level easy yarn used for this project lightweight #3 yarn cotton kings cotton 8/8 100% cotton from www hobbii com yardage approx 41yds 38m of light weight yarn or 25g tools needed hook size usa 7 metric 4 5mm darning needle to weave in ends stitch marker scissors gauge / gauge worked in hhdc as pattern 5cm x 5cm 2in x 2in = 7 sts and 6 row finished size 3 75in 9 5cm width x 5 75in 14 5cm height abbreviations us crochet terms chain = chain stitch single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch blo = back loop only st s = stitch es hhdc herringbone half_double_crochet skip = skip round = round washing instructions machine at 30 degrees do not tumble dry lay flat to dry always check the yarn label for full wash and care instructions pattern notes to make one hhdc yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over & pull loop through stitch and through first loop on hook two loops remain on hook yarn over and pull through both loops to make one puff insert hook in stitch yarn over and pull through *yarn over insert hook in same stitch yarn over and pull through repeat from * 2 more times until you have 8 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all 8 loops ch1 to secure the stitch the number of sts you should have at the end of each round is mentioned between the pattern includes two different options for the opening edge & hanger loop - option a is the pink sack which has a clean opening edge and two little handles for hanging - option b is the sand sack which has a puff opening edge and a small hanger loop it is recommended to use 100% cotton yarn or cotton blends for this pattern because it is soft on the skin and easy to wash © loopy handmade 2021 www loopyhandmade com 2/7 loopy handmade instructions let s get making foundation starting at the bottom of the bag ch12 round 1 work 2sc into 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in each chain until you reach the last chain work 4sc into last chain and turn your work clockwise but do not flip it over continue along the other side working 1sc into the blo of each chain until you reach the last chain 2sc in last chain which is the same chain you made the 2sc at the start do not
